languages.text: "Я бы не хотел раскрывать детали по вокс-связи — ее могут прослушивать те, кому предстоит держать перед вами ответ за свои поступки".

traits.locale_text: "Я не могу говорить об этом по вокс-связи, линия может быть скомпрометирована".

languages.text: "I would prefer not to divulge details over vox — it could be overheard by those who will have to stand before you and answer for their actions."
languages.original_text: "Я бы не хотел раскрывать детали по вокс-связи — ее могут прослушивать те, кому предстоит держать перед вами ответ за свои поступки".

traits.locale_text: "I would prefer not to divulge details over vox — it could be overheard by those who will have to stand before you and answer for their actions."
"I would prefer not to divulge details over vox — it could be overheard by those who will have to stand before you and answer for their actions."
"I would prefer not to divulge details over vox — it could be overheard by those who will have to stand before you and answer for their actions."
"I would prefer not to divulge details over vox — it could be overheard by those who will have to stand before you and answer for their actions."
"I would prefer not to divulge details over vox — it could be overheard by those who will have to stand before you and answer for their actions."

languages.text: 「詳細をヴォクス越しに話すのは控えたいと思います。あなたの前に立ち、自分の行いについて釈明しなければならない者たちに内容を聞かれてしまう可能性がありますので」
languages.original_text: "I would prefer not to divulge details over vox — it could be overheard by those who will have to stand before you and answer for their actions."

traits.locale_text: 「詳細をヴォクス越しに話すのは控えたいと思います。あなたの前に立ち、自分の行いについて釈明しなければならない者たちに内容を聞かれてしまう可能性がありますので」

languages.text: "Ayrıntıları voks üzerinden paylaşmamayı tercih ederim. Aksi hâlde karşınıza çıkıp hesap vermesi gerekenlerin kulağına gidebilir."
languages.original_text: "I would prefer not to divulge details over vox — it could be overheard by those who will have to stand before you and answer for their actions."

traits.locale_text: "Ayrıntıları voks üzerinden paylaşmamayı tercih ederim. Aksi hâlde karşınıza çıkıp hesap vermesi gereken kişilerin kulağına gidebilir."

languages.text: «Preferiría no entrar en detalles por el voco, podrían escucharlo quienes tendrán que presentarse ante usted y responder de sus acciones».
languages.original_text: "I would prefer not to divulge details over vox — it could be overheard by those who will have to stand before you and answer for their actions."

traits.locale_text: «Preferiría no entrar en detalles por el voco, podrían escucharlo quienes tendrán que presentarse ante usted y responder de sus acciones».

languages.text: “我不打算在音阵频道上透露更多细节，因为这些细节可能会被那些犯下罪行、需要辩护的人偷听到。”
languages.original_text: "I would prefer not to divulge details over vox — it could be overheard by those who will have to stand before you and answer for their actions."

traits.locale_text: “我不打算在音阵频道上透露更多细节，因为这些细节可能会被那些犯下罪行、需要辩护的人偷听到。”

languages.text: « Je préférerais éviter de divulguer les détails de l'affaire par communication-vox, de crainte que les accusés appelés à comparaître devant vous ne surprennent notre conversation. »
languages.original_text: "I would prefer not to divulge details over vox — it could be overheard by those who will have to stand before you and answer for their actions."

traits.locale_text: « Je préférerais éviter de divulguer les détails de l'affaire par communication-vox, de crainte que les accusés appelés à comparaître devant vous ne surprennent notre conversation. »

languages.text: "Ich würde die Details nur ungern über Vox besprechen ... sie könnten von den Beschuldigten abgehört werden."
languages.original_text: "I would prefer not to divulge details over vox — it could be overheard by those who will have to stand before you and answer for their actions."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde die Details nur ungern über Vox besprechen ... sie könnten von den Beschuldigten abgehört werden."
